overview:
In addition to his role at Highland, Wyc is Managing Partner, Governor and Chief Executive Officer of the Boston Celtics. He is also the Chair of the NBA Planning Committee and is a member of the leagueâ€™s Audit & Compensation Committee and Advisory/Finance Committee.

Prior to leading an investment group that purchased the Celtics in 2002, Wyc served as a General Partner with Highland for seven years. During this period, he was an investor in many successful healthcare services, medical technology and information technology companies, including: Answers Corporation (IPO), Conor Medsystems (IPO), Curis (IPO/acquired), EXACT Sciences (IPO), GenVec (IPO), Odyssey HealthCare (IPO), NuGenesis Technologies (acquired) and Relicore (acquired).

His earlier career included four years as a venture capital lawyer in Silicon Valley and two years as a manager in a public biotech company. Wyc is also a former national collegiate champion oarsman.
